programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Georgia Heard thought she had parenting all mapped out. But when the younger of her two boys was diagnosed with severe Autism at 15 months old, her journey took an unexpected turn.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pieta Bouma was just 19 years old when she broke her back while living in Ecuador. Nearly two years on she's immersed in student life, finding new ways to enjoy old loves, and becoming a strong voice for the community.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:

programme.title: The Last Fur Trader
programme.desc:
In the early 1950s, In Last of the Fur Traders he returns to the Arctic to share his footage. Hugh Kroetsch worked on the Arctic Ocean as a Hudson's Bay Company engineer and filmed his travels.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Chris Kosh: Make Life Happen
programme.desc:
Chris Koch is a pretty normal guy. He is a traveller, farmer, motivational speaker and athlete. He has dived with sharks, run marathons and hitchhiked solo across Canada. You name it, he has probably done it.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP30) On débute l'émission avec le hockey inclusif et on poursuit avec la loi récente sur l'accessibilité en Colombie-Britannique. On vous présente aussi, une oreillette intelligente qui détecte plus rapidement l'Alzheimer ou le Parkinson.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:

programme.desc:
Kristin suffered a childhood trauma. Now, at 40, stress and an unhealthy lifestyle are putting her future at risk. Can training for a long-distance bike ride push her health to the top of Kristin's To-Do list?

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
